sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState,useEffect}from 'react' import { Wrapper, Container, InputsContainer, SearchBox, SearchInput, FilterSelect, FilterOption, SearchIcon, CardsContainer, CountryCard, Image, CountryTitle, CountryInfo, Info } from '../HomePage/style' import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai' function HomePage(props) { const [countries,setCountries] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/all') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setCountries(data)) }, []) if(!countries){ return
loading
} return ( Filter by Region Africa Americas Asia Europa Oceania {countries.map((item,index) =>( {item.name.common} Population: {item.population} Region: {item.region} Capital: {item.capital} ))} ) } export default HomePage
